job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Our client is a late-stage software security unicorn currently experiencing exponential growth from an unprecedented increase in market demand. This is an opportunity to partake in an IPO and make a substantial impact on the product within a growing engineering organization.

As a member of the Platform Engineering Team, you will design, develop, and deploy code critical to maintaining software on different platforms, bridging the gap between hardware and software.


Are you ready for a highly collaborative and exhilarating work environment?

Responsibilities you will take on:

  • Design, Develop and Deploy Code (80%)
  • Implement Python tooling (scripts, APIs) for the development team and the product
  • Userelational and non-relational databases topromote data flow

Your Profile:

  • BS or MS (STEM Degree)
  • 1-3+ years ofexperience designing anddeployingsoftware
  • Proficiencywith modern programming languagessuch as Python orModern C++
  • Experience withUnix/Linux
  • Comfortabledebugging, testing, and documenting

Nice to have:

  • Cloud computing experience (AWS, Azure,etc)
  • Familiarity withCI/CD systems
  • Experience with infrastructure as code, such as Terraform
  • Docker and/orPodmanexposure

If you are currently open to new opportunities and want to take your career to the next level, please contact me to discuss this opportunity along with alternativeEngineeringpositions within the Austin Computer Software Technology Space.

All conversations are confidential, and we will only submit your information after attaining your consent.
